Text:
I'm new at this, the download has 3 exe files and a txt file with serial. Do I just run the exe files? In which order? After installation can you update the software?
Thank you.
I keep getting "No permissions to run application" everytime I try to run an app. Any ideas?
nvm, this was a complete waste of time =[

Thanks for this upload.
Tested on XP & Win7 works great without any problems!
everything works for me, thanks....but the serial for soundsoap doesnt work. in search of one
folks, you got to write more than "it don't work"  others are reporting success, if you are looking for help, give some details :)
It works just fine. The user who said they had no run permission, thats an error you get when running it out of sandbox.

i agree "it don't work" for me either.  i installed each exe.  1st content then pro then pro disc 2.  roxio creator 2010 home pro loads but no other apps load.  no other way to describe it.  i got windows 7

It is a complete waste of time to bother with this.  To those who are also getting the "No Permissions To Launch Application" error message, if you do a Google search, nearly everyone is having the same issue.  Sonic doesn't have a viable working solution for it either.  I think this is the first time I'm considering switching to Nero, as even my Roxio 2009 won't run on Win7 x64.
Also, it is NOT an error for running an app "out of sandbox", what kind of retarded bogus-ness is that?

NERO is much better anyway.  But don't bother with the Nero 10 torrents.  None have worked for me.  None.  And I haven't heard of one person yet who has actually said they have installed AND successfully used Nero 10 from these torrents.
Roxio is too bloated anyway....
